scripts.build-headless:linux: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -tags headless -o dist/linux/kie_sandbox_extended_services_headless main.go
scripts.build:linux: GOOS=linux GOARCH=amd64 go build -o dist/linux/kie_sandbox_extended_services main.go && pnpm build-headless:linux
